amends_amendment.description: Amendment removes the civil liability of a lender and cancel the right of rescission for a borrower in instances when a borrower knowingly lied on their mortgage loan application.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 110-450 to remove the civil liability of a lender and cancel the right of rescission for a borrower in instances when a borrower knowingly lied on their mortgage loan application.

description: Amendment adds that the obligor must have had actual knowledge of the false material information for the exemption from liability to take effect.
